titleStmt.title: The godly mans portion and sanctuary opened, in two sermons, preached August 17. 1662 / by R.A.
titleStmt.author: R. A. (Richard Alleine), 1611-1681.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Richard Alleine, 1611-1681.
Identified on reel 1881 as Wing (2nd ed.) A989.
Reproduction of originals in the British Library and the Congregational Library, London, England.
